string-array.name: details
string-array.item:
1. At first you need to turn on this feature by taping "Auto Reply Off" button.
 2. Give the permission that app ask for.
 3. You can set customized text for auto reply.
 4. Then turn on or turn off this feature.
 5. Customize the time. How many time to send the reply for each person or group in a day.
 6. Also activate this feature for group chat by taping on "Auto Reply for Group chat".

1. Tap on "Ascii face" button on home section or select "Text Fun" from bottom navbar.
 2. Select "Ascii face" icon from top navbar.
 3. Here you can Direct go to "Schedule Messages" section by taping "clock" icon.
 4. You can copy,share the text with anyone.

1. Click "Caption" button on Home section.
 2. Select Category All,Greeting,Sales,Promotion,Love,Romantic,WishBox,Shayari,Motivation and much more.
 3. New screen open.You can select category by clicking "Category" option.
 4. Here you can Direct go to "Schedule Messages" section by taping "clock" icon.
 5. You can copy,share the text with anyone.

1. There are two option.
 2. First one is in Home screen
 * Paste or Type WA number and send it to "WA" or "WA Business" by clicking "WA" or "WA Business" icon.
 * Also send blank messages.
 3. Second one is "Chat" from bottom navbar
 * At first Type or paste number.
 * Select one of the "Quick messages" or type any text if you want.
 * Also go to Caption,Text Repeater,Ascii face,Decoration text section by clicking individual icon.
 * Customize the time.
 * Select one of that "WA" or "WA Business".(Default: WA)
 * After click on "Send" button.

1. Tap on "Decoration Text" button on home section or select "Text Fun" from bottom navbar.
 2. Select "Decoration Text" icon from top navbar.
 3. Type any text to design. Scroll and Select one of that which you like most.
 4. Here you can Direct go to "Schedule Messages" section by taping "clock" icon.
 5. You can copy,share the text with anyone.
 6. Also direct send to "WA" or "WA Business" by just click the icon.

1. Tap on "Quick Messages" button on home section or select "Text Fun" from bottom navbar.
 2. Select "Quick Messages" icon from top navbar.
 3. Here you find three option.
 * Category :
 - Here you find random most usages text messages.
 * Saved :
 - Here you can save customized messages which you used most.Click the "Plus" icon to add new quick messages.
 * Language :
 - You can Set language English,Hindi,Bengali or Mixed.
 4. Scroll and Select one of that which you like most.
 5. Here you can Direct go to "Schedule Messages" section by taping "clock" icon.
 6. You can copy,share the text with anyone.
 7. Also direct send to "WA" or "WA Business" by just click the icon.

1. Tap on "Recover Sms" button on home section or select "Restore" from bottom navbar.
 2. Give the permission that app ask for.
 3. When someone delete messages from "WA" or "WA Business" app will notify you or you can find out this deleted messages here.
 4. Yon can delete this conversation permanently.
 5. But this app does not Recover photos and videos for now.

1. Tap on "Status Download" button on home section or select "Status" from bottom navbar.
 2. Give the permission that app ask for.
 3. Select one of that "All","Images","Video" or "Downloaded" option from the top navbar.
 4. Choose "WA" or "WA Business" Status to show.
 5. Here you find "Share","Download","WA","WA Business" icon to the bottom of images or videos.
 6. Click on those icon to share,download or send to WA or WA business account.
 7. Find the Downloaded file from "Downloaded" section from top navbar.

1. Tap on "Try it" button on Schedule card in home section top.
 2. Here you can check the history of all Schedule messages.
 3. If you want to edit just click on the conversation and save it again.
 4. Add new schedule messages just tap on "Plus" button on bottom right.
 5. Fill the all details and Save it.
 6. If you want to reset or delete the form just click on "Delete" button.

1. Tap on "Text Repeater" button on home section or select "Text Fun" from bottom navbar.
 2. Select "Text Repeater" icon from top navbar.
 3. Type any text to Repeat. After that how many time to repeat the text by entering the number in "Repeat number" textbox.
 4. Then click on "Convert" button.
 5. If you want to reset Click on "Cross" icon.
 4. Below you can Direct go to "Schedule Messages" section by taping "clock" icon.
 5. You can copy,share the text with anyone.
 6. Also direct send to "WA" or "WA Business" by just click the icon.

string-array.name: usage
string-array.item: 1. Auto Reply use for easily customized reply text to your friend or customer in few seconds.\n 2. Through it you are able to automatically send messages.\n 3. It also available for Group chat.
Ascii face option use for design face reaction for fun and showing our expressing by some symbol.

SMS Template option use for All type of most usage messages.Easily sent to your friend by your choice.\n Like Greeting,Sales,Promotion,Love,Romantic,WishBox,Shayari,Motivation,Festival,Inspiration,Sad.\n Also you can use it.
Direct Chat option use for Sending messages without saving his/her number.\n Available.
Decoration text use for Design your name and text which you like to try different type of font and design.
Quick messages will help you send most useful messages or repeatedly send messages to a person or customer.\n Available in three language.\n You can add also.
Recover messages option use for Recover your "Messsages".
Now you can download Image and Video status using status download option and Share to your friend.
It can help repeat the text how many time you want.And share to your friend or customer.
Schedule the messages by setup text and wishes to your friend or customer.\n Automatically app will send messages on time which you saved.
